name: Cheikh Ahmed Tidiani Top
bio: Tidiani has over 8 years of experience in full stack development, specializing in React/Node.js architectures. He has led multiple development teams on large-scale projects for Senegalese and international companies. Graduate of École Polytechnique de Thiès.

name: Souleymane Sanokho
bio: Souleymane is a passionate software engineer with solid expertise in full stack development. He masters modern technologies including React, Next.js, TypeScript and PostgreSQL. He has contributed to numerous open source projects and technical training programs in Senegal.

name: Issa Diané
bio: Issa specializes in developing high-performance and scalable web applications. With a degree in Computer Engineering from UCAD, she excels in creating intuitive user interfaces and robust backends using modern web technologies.

name: Baye Lam
bio: Baye specializes in DevOps practices and cloud infrastructure management with over 6 years of experience. Expert in Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and AWS/Azure cloud platforms, he has optimized deployment processes and infrastructure automation for companies across Senegal and West Africa.
